page.title: 14THE QUEENSWAY HALL
page.content: The Q.H.was opened on April 16th 1964 and built on the site of some orchards. At first,it was owned by the council, but now it is privately run. The management are not involved in promotion of any kind_they merely hire out it's rooms.There are 7 main areas including the restaurant.The main hall is used as a venue for dinner dances, pop concerts,opera,cabaret,wrestling & private functions.The other areas are let for a variety of private functions e.g. the meetings of the parish council.Prices vary between '60_'1000 for the hiring of the hall,depending on which night is required.The hall has a seating capacity of 820.The Q.H.is a lively centre of activity,and is now taking bookings for 1987.
